title: East to Edinburgh Festival
description: Get a sneak peek of the fringe without leaving NYC. Before they head to Scotland for the Edinburgh Festival Fringe, 15 shows from across New York and the U.S. take center stage at 59E59 theaters (UES).

title: The Gospel at Colonus
description: Little Island continues its 2025 season with an outdoor production of The Gospel at Colonus, featuring Kim Burrell, Davóne Tines, Samantha Howard, Ayana George Jackson, Serpentwithfeet, and more.

title: Live at the Gantries
description: Kupferberg Center for the Arts presents Live at the Gantries, an annual outdoor concert series at Gantry Plaza State Park (LIC) showcasing local artists. Tonight: Migguel Anggelo’s second episode of ‘Icons’ pays tribute to legendary Cuban singer Celia Cruz in honor of her 100th birthday year.

title: Booze + Build
description: A playful night of building brick fun for grown-ups where you use a set of freestyle bricks to bring your wildest ideas to life. Enjoy games, challenges, and prizes along the way.

title: Gen Z vs Millennials Gameshow
description: Two pairs of comics compete in a series of challenges to see which generation rules. Hosted by Bobby Hickey and Erik Martini.

title: Naumburg Orchestral Concerts: 2025 Season
description: The Naumburg Orchestral Concerts series returns for its 120th season at historic Naumburg Bandshell in Central Park. Tonight: Orchestra of St. Luke’s performs works by Mozart, Dvořák, and Mendelssohn.
